item.title: By: Tory
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description: Thank you, Erik. That was kind. I didn't mean to stop. It just... happened. They may come back. There are more words. There are so many more words to draw.
item.content:encoded: Thank you, Erik. That was kind. I didn’t mean to stop. It just… happened. They may come back. There are more words. There are so many more words to draw.

item.title: By: Erik R.
item.dc:creator: Erik R.
item.description:
I'm sad that these have stopped, but happy that you managed to find the time for them at all. I can't begin to contemplate how many hours were spent on the project.
You really should consider creating a book of them somehow. Are there self-publishing services for desk calendars? Something to squeeze some money out of the effort. I'd buy two.
item.content:encoded:
I’m sad that these have stopped, but happy that you managed to find the time for them at all. I can’t begin to contemplate how many hours were spent on the project.

You really should consider creating a book of them somehow. Are there self-publishing services for desk calendars? Something to squeeze some money out of the effort. I’d buy two.
